q1: Spain has quite a few aging players.  Will they be strong force in the European Championships?
a1: I don't think so they did not well perform in WC.
q2: Can Spain beat France in Euro Cup?
a2: Probably not. Spain has great players, but in my opinion, France is a much stronger team overall.
q3: That could change very quickly though surely?
a3: Are there youth teams performing really well to give a hint of what the future will bring?
q4: IS SPAIN GONNA WIN THIS YEAR?
